definitions.definition: The reflexive of the royal or editorial we : myself (as used by one who is a monarch, writer or speaker when referring to oneself as we ).
examples: In the present study, we will limit ourself to the simplest of cases.

definitions.definition: The reflexive of the generic we : oneself .
examples: We should love our neighbor as ourself .

definitions.definition: Reflexive of "we" referring to an individual person being addressed, especially a person in the speaker's care.
examples: Hello Mrs Miggins. Did we manage to wash ourself this morning?
Well done Timmy! Did we make that model ourself ?

main_definition: ( reflexive pronoun ) The reflexive of the royal or editorial we : myself (as used by one who is a monarch, writer or speaker when referring to oneself as we ).
secondary_definitions: ( reflexive pronoun ) The reflexive of the generic we : oneself .
( colloquial ) Reflexive of "we" referring to an individual person being addressed, especially a person in the speaker's care.
( African-American Vernacular ) The reflexive of we : ourselves .
